tasks.name: Musical Imagery Task
tasks.definition: Participants were instructed to imagine an 8-minute symphony while watching a silent movie that visualized the music. The visualization provided real-time visual cues to inform subjects of the content of musical imagery and assisted in controlling the timing of the imagery process.

tasks.name: Musical Perception Task
tasks.definition: Participants listened to an 8-minute symphony with their eyes closed. The task involved direct auditory input without any visual stimuli.
